function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Preference for living in gated communities due to increased security and safety during pandemics","Impact":"Segregation and limited interaction with the broader community, potential for unequal access to resources","Mitigation":"Promotion of community integration and access to resources for all residents, public health awareness and education","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, surveillance and monitoring systems, public health communication tools","People":"Residents of gated communities, broader community, public health officials","Owner":"Community associations, local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Less satisfaction with housing design among younger age group","Impact":"Potential for dissatisfaction and disengagement from community, impact on mental well-being","Mitigation":"Inclusion of diverse housing designs that cater to different family sizes and needs, community engagement and feedback mechanisms","Technologies":"Virtual reality modeling, community feedback apps, community engagement platforms","People":"Younger age group, housing developers, community planners","Owner":"Housing developers, community associations, local government"},{"Description":"Compact housing design leading to lower satisfaction with floor area","Impact":"Impact on residents' comfort and well-being, potential for crowding and lack of personal space","Mitigation":"Design of flexible and efficient living spaces, promotion of outdoor and public spaces, community engagement for feedback and improvements","Technologies":"Architectural design software, flexible furniture solutions, community feedback apps","People":"Residents of compact housing, community planners, architects, designers","Owner":"Housing developers, community associations, local government"}]}
